ability_desc: Ringo's next basic attack after killing anything will be a critical strike.
Ringo fires a trick shot at his target's heel (or whatever lower extremity exists), slowing the target & dealing damage.
Ringo slings bullets at his target in a mad flurry, dramatically increasing his attack speed & move speed for 7 seconds. Resets basic attack cooldown on activation.

Ringo takes a long swig from his gourd and breathes out a scorching fireball at his target. The explosion pierces all shield, deals splash damage on impact and sets the target on fire, burning it & nearby enemies for 7 seconds.
